Show:

Hub Class

Defined in: src/hub.js:4

Defines fdom.Hub, the core message hub between freedom modules. Incomming messages from apps are sent to hub.onMessage()

Constructor

(
  • debug
)

Defined in src/hub.js:4

Parameters:

  • debug Debug

    Logger for debugging.

Methods

deregister

(
  • app
)
Boolean

Defined in src/hub.js:109

Deregister a destination for messages with the hub. Note: does not remove associated routes. As such, deregistering will prevent the installation of new routes, but will not distrupt existing hub routes.

Parameters:

  • app Port

    The Port to deregister

Returns:

Boolean:

Whether the app was deregistered.

error

()

Defined in src/debug.js:166

Print an error message to the console.

format

(
  • severity
  • source
  • args
)
private

Defined in src/debug.js:67

Dispatch a debug message with arbitrary severity. All debug messages are routed through the manager, to allow for delegation.

Parameters:

  • severity String

    the severity of the message.

  • source String

    The location of message.

  • args String

    The contents of the message.

getLoggingShim

(
  • asyncMethod
)

Defined in src/debug.js:194

Create a synchronous 'getLogger' method that binds around an asynchronous logger by creating a buffer until the asynchronous logger is resolved.

Parameters:

  • asyncMethod Function

    The wrapper to 'getLogger'

install

(
  • source
  • destination
  • flow
  • quiet
)
String

Defined in src/hub.js:126

Install a new route in the hub.

Parameters:

  • source Port

    The source of the route.

  • destination Port

    The destination of the route.

  • flow String

    The flow where the destination will receive messages.

  • quiet Boolean

    Whether messages on this route should be suppressed.

Returns:

String:

A routing source identifier for sending messages.

onMessage

(
  • source
  • message
)

Defined in src/debug.js:45

Handler for receiving messages sent to the debug port. These messages are used to retreive config for exposing console.

Parameters:

  • source String

    the source identifier for the message.

  • message Object

    the received message.

(
  • source
  • message
)

Defined in src/hub.js:23

Handle an incoming message from a freedom app.

    The identifiying source of the message.

  • message Object

    The sent message.

print

(
  • message
)

Defined in src/debug.js:109

Print received messages on the console. This is called by the manager in response to an emission from format.

Parameters:

  • message Object

    The message emitted by {@see format} to print.
